mapper.select: select r.id, m.name, r.subject, r.img, r.content, r.readcount, r.like_count, r.date from recipe_board r join member m on r.member_id = m.id order by id desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: update recipe_board set readcount=readcount+1 where id=#{id}
update recipe_board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.select: select r.id, m.name, r.subject, r.img, r.content, r.readcount, r.like_count, r.date from recipe_board r join member m on r.member_id = m.id where r.subject like #{search} order by id desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
